conversations.value: What are effective ways to cut down on entertainment expenses?
Turn off lights when not in use and switch to energy-efficient appliances.

Pay off the smallest debt first, then roll the payment into the next smallest.

List all expenses and prioritize essentials to create a realistic budget.
